titleStmt.title: The liberty of the subject by Magna Charta, or, Several weighty things to be considered of by the jurors and judges, seeing the law of England is said to be a law of mercy and doth take care jurors be of the next neighbourhood ...
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

titleStmt.title: The liberty of the subject by Magna Charta, or, Several weighty things to be considered of by the jurors and judges, seeing the law of England is said to be a law of mercy and doth take care jurors be of the next neighbourhood ...
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Farnworth. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
